items.text: turns this gently towards the man coming in from deep square leg.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: spins back in to beat the tickle down leg, Taylor fumbles and they get across for a bye as well, so two more to the score.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 2 wides

items.text: squeezes this yorker-length delivery back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: goes right back into the crease to turn this tossed up delivery into the leg side.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: right behind the line as he defends.
items.postText: Tafadzwa Mareya: "Hummy must now gamble. The magic man Jarvis is left with very few overs. Either he can bring him back to break partnership, or save him for death."
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: makes a bit of room and cuts to deep point.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: drops short, so he rocks back and pulls all along the ground to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and crashes this short delivery to sweeper cover.
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: punches this straight to short midwicket
items.postText: angel: "BD definitely need more than at least 220 today. Let's not discredit ZIM's batting altogether just because they haven't won too many games. BD is without their key bowler in Shakib, so they will need some runs on the board to defend."
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: sharp turn but the impact may have been just outside off. Thin inside edge too as he defended forward.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: lunges forward and defends this gently back to the bowler
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: makes room and eases this into the gap at point for a single.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on leg stump, smothered pretty nicely.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: full toss that has been whipped straight back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: rocks back and hammers this short delivery into the gap at midwicket. That will definitely break the shackles.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, FOUR runs

items.preText: Saif: "Please please don't comment, Khan. We are just recovering from that triple strike from Jarvis."
items.text: leading edge that rolls into the off side, closed the bat face a little too early.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: jabs this away into the gap towards point for a quick single.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: fires in a yorker, kept out somehow.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: gentle push into the covers for a single, but he'll get an extra run because there's an overthrow at the bowler's end.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, 2 runs

items.text: makes a bit of room and punches into the gap at cover.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on middle and leg, worked with the spin towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: right on top of the bounce as he turns this into the leg side.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: turns this into the gap between deep midwicket and deep square, good work by the boundary riders though.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: bisects deep square and deep midwicket perfectly. Dropped short, he was right back inside the crease to muscle this into the gap, couple of bounces to the ropes. The crowd roars.
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: fired into the stumps from round the wicket, blocked.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run
